nodes.text: Sa'arli was a female Tarasin who served as an aide to Senator Lavina Wren of Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. She had a tattoo of a snakelike lizard whose tail ran from her jawline to up around her ear-slit.

In 21 BBY, second year in the Clone Wars, Sa'arli traveled to the Almas Academy, to take part in a private ceremony of gratitude towards the heroes who defeated slaver Phylus Mon. On behalf of Senator Wren, Sa'arli awarded the heroes with the Order of Cularin.
Sa'arli's name is written Sa'Arli in A Mon Alone.
